translation.ja: “激しい歓喜は　　　 激しい最後を迎える”

translation.en: And in their triumph die, like fire and powder.
translation.ja: “触れあえば はじける 火と火薬のように⸺”
“歓喜の絶頂で 死が訪れる”
エドワード　ダメよ

translation.en: Gran, I'd like you to meet--
I thought we agreed no presents.
Well, the one from me's not wrapped. So it doesn't count.
translation.ja: 包んでないんだ 大した物じゃない
カメラね　ありがとう

translation.en: Uh, it goes with this one from your mom.
translation.ja: ママからはアルバムだ

translation.en: We coordinated. Well, she coordinated me.
translation.ja: ママの考えた組み合わせ

translation.en: It's to, uh, put your pictures in from senior year.
translation.ja: 高校最後の思い出を 残せるように

translation.en: How'd you get so old so fast?

translation.ja: やめて　まだ年じゃないわ
やめて　まだ年じゃないわ でも それは白髪だろ？
でも それは白髪だろ？

translation.en: [man on radio] Another missing hiker brings the total to three presumed dead.
translation.ja: またハイキング客が 行方不明

translation.en: Rangers are searching for the killer animal--
translation.ja: 野生動物に襲われたか…

translation.en: Uh, R and J essay due?

translation.ja: “なぜ あなたはベラなの？”

translation.en: Let me take a picture of you guys.
My mom wants me to put together, like, a big scrapbook full of memories.
translation.ja: 写真 撮らせて ママが思い出を残せって アルバムを

translation.en: -Oh, cool, yeah. -I take 'em, I'm not in 'em, so…
You'll Photoshop this if my nose looks big, right?
[Eric] Don't worry, I'm in the picture. No one will be looking at you guys.
translation.ja: 誰も僕以外 見ないって
エドワード様の ご登場
おめでとう 言わないで

translation.en: Bell, your birth is definitely something to celebrate.
Yeah, but my aging is not.
I think 18 is a little young to start worrying about that.
-It's one year older than you. -No, it isn't.
translation.ja: でも１歳 年上よ 違う　僕は109歳だ

translation.en: [Bella] Wow. Maybe I shouldn't be dating such an old man. -Mmm. -It's gross.
translation.ja: そんな おじいちゃんと 付き合ってるわけ？
マジにゾッとしちゃう

translation.en: We have to go to class.
[Bella] Hello, biceps. You know, anabolic steroids are really bad for you.
translation.ja: すごいマッチョね ステロイドは体に悪いわよ

translation.en: [Jacob chuckles] Well, I'm just filling out, Bella.
You know, it wouldn't seem so drastic if we hung out more.
translation.ja: もっと会えたら分かるのに

translation.en: You should switch schools. You can come hang out with the palefaces.
translation.ja: この学校へ転校すれば？

translation.en: I'm all right. I prefer the rez school's exclusivity.
translation.ja: 僕は先住民居留地の 高校がいい

translation.en: They let any old riff-raff into this place.
translation.ja: ここはワルもいるだろ？

translation.en: I see. Then why are you slummin' it?
I was just buying a part for the Rabbit.
You should really come take a ride when it's done.
translation.ja: 修理したらドライブしよう

translation.en: [Jacob] Your dad told my dad, so…
I saw this the other day and thought of you.
translation.ja: この先住民の お守りを君に

translation.en: -Good seeing you. -Yeah, I'll see you later.
So how come Jacob Black gets to give you a gift and I don't?
translation.ja: なぜ僕は贈り物が できないんだ？

translation.en: 'Cause I have nothing to give back to you.
translation.ja: 私が何も返せないから

translation.en: Bella, you give me everything just by breathing.
translation.ja: そばにいるだけでいい
その言葉 最高の贈り物よ
その言葉 最高の贈り物よ ベラ

translation.en: [scoffs] I thought I said no presents.
I've already seen you open it, and guess what?
You're gonna wear it tonight. Our place.
translation.ja: 今夜 着てくること

translation.en: Come on, please? [Alice] It'll be fun.
translation.ja: パーティ 来てよ 楽しいから

translation.en: [giggles] Great! Okay, I'll see you at seven.
Jasper. No fair with the mood control thing.
translation.ja: ジャスパー 私の感情を操らないで
ごめん　お誕生日おめ…
吸血鬼(ヴァンパイア)は油断ならない ほんと 参るよ

translation.en: [man on TV] O, my love. My wife!
translation.ja: 愛する恋人　私の妻よ

translation.en: Death, that hath sucked the honey of thy breath, but hath no power yet upon thy beauty.
translation.ja: 死は君の息を奪ったが 美しさまでは奪えぬ
お祝いされるの 大嫌い

translation.en: [Edward] There are worse tragedies. Look at Romeo.
translation.ja: でもロミオの方が悲惨だ

translation.en: Killed his true love out of sheer stupidity.
translation.ja: バカな行為で 愛する人を死なせた

translation.en: But I do envy him one thing.

translation.ja: ジュリエットのことね？

translation.en: If you like that obviously beautiful sort of thing.
Not the girl, the, uh… the suicide.
translation.ja: 違うよ 自殺のことだ
ほとんど不可能だから
僕たちの⸺ 種族には
でも人間は⸺ 少しの毒薬や⸺
心臓の ひと突きで⸺

translation.en: 'Cause I had to consider it once.
[Edward] I didn't know if I'd get to you in time.
I had to come up with some kind of… plan.
translation.ja: その時は “あること”をしようと

translation.en: Go to Italy and provoke the Volturi.
translation.ja: イタリアへ行き ヴォルトゥーリに背く

translation.en: [teacher] Now, who'd like to repeat the last few lines of iambic pentameter
translation.ja: ではロミオのセリフを 朗読して

translation.en: just to show they were paying attention?
will I set up my everlasting rest…
…and shake the yoke of inauspicious stars from this world-wearied flesh.
translation.ja: “忌まわしき運命を この肉体から振り払おう”

translation.en: And lips, O you, the doors of breath,
translation.ja: “唇よ　おれの呼吸の門よ”

translation.en: seal with a righteous kiss a dateless bargain to engrossing death."
translation.ja: “高潔な口づけで 死と永遠の契りを結べ”

translation.en: [Edward] The Volturi are a very old, very powerful family.
translation.ja: ヴォルトゥーリは 絶大な権力を持つ一族で⸺

translation.en: I guess they're the closest thing to royalty my world has.
He lived with them for a few decades. Described them as very refined.
translation.ja: 何十年か彼らと暮らして “とても洗練された一族”と

translation.en: No respect for human life, of course,
but respect for the arts and the sciences, at least.
translation.ja: 人間の命ではなく⸺ 芸術や科学をこそ重んじる

translation.en: And only one that's regularly enforced.
translation.ja: 最も 守られるべき掟は…

translation.en: [Edward] That we keep the existence of our kind a secret.
translation.ja: 種族の存在を　 秘密にすること

translation.en: We don't make spectacles of ourselves.
translation.ja: だから人目を　　 引くことはしない
僕らと分かる殺しも やらない

translation.en: Unless, of course, you want to die.
You gotta stop talking about that.
The only thing that can hurt me is you.
translation.ja: 君が危険な目に遭う以外⸺

translation.en: And I don't have anything else to be afraid of.
Victoria. She'll come for me one day.
translation.ja: ヴィクトリアは 僕を殺しにくる

translation.en: Alice will see when she decides, and…
translation.ja: でもアリスの予知能力で⸺

translation.en: Bella. You already do protect me.
translation.ja: 君は もう守ってくれてるよ

translation.en: to stay alive, if that's what I am.
translation.ja: 生きてるんだ もし生きてると言えるなら

translation.en: But it's my job to protect you.
translation.ja: 君を守るのは僕の責任だ
皆から守らなきゃ アリス以外のね

translation.en: It's time, it's time, it's time.
Sorry about all this. We tried to rein Alice in.
translation.ja: すまない アリスが聞かなくて

translation.en: As if that were even possible. Happy birthday, Bella.
translation.ja: 頑固なの お誕生日おめでとう

translation.en: I… found it in your bag. Mind?
translation.ja: あなたのバッグに 入ってたの　ダメ？
年上のカノジョか　やるな

translation.en: It's a necklace. Alice picked it out.
translation.ja: ネックレスよ アリスが選んだの

translation.en: Already installed it in your truck. Finally a decent sound system for that piece of--
translation.ja: 最高のカー･ステレオ 君のポンコツに積んどいた

translation.en: Hey, don't… don't hate the truck.

translation.ja: エズミとカーライルからよ

translation.en: [Carlisle] Just a little something to brighten your day.
Yes, you've been looking kind of pale lately.
translation.ja: 最近 顔色が悪いしね

translation.en: -[Jasper panting] -Jaz, Jaz, shh, shh. It's okay. It's just a little…
translation.ja: ジャスパー　落ちついて ただの…
ごめん　私も危ない

translation.en: I'll have to stitch this up in my office.
[Carlisle] I'm sure he's very upset with himself, and I doubt he'll listen to anyone but you right now.
translation.ja: 動揺して 君にしか 耳を貸さないだろう

translation.en: [Bella] I never wanted to have a party.
translation.ja: 私のパーティのせいね

translation.en: Jasper hasn't been away from human blood as long as the rest of us.
translation.ja: 彼は人間の血に 我慢できないんだ
長年 鍛えたからね

translation.en: just doing it the easy way?
-I knew who I wanted to be. -[tool clinks] I wanted to help people.
translation.ja: 私は人間の 役に立つことが⸺

translation.en: -Brings me happiness. -[snips] -Even if I am damned, regardless. -[scissors clink]
translation.ja: 幸せなんだ たとえ呪われた存在でも
地獄へ⸺ 堕(お)ちるとか？

translation.en: You've always been very… gracious about us.
translation.ja: 君は いつも⸺ 我々に やさしいね

translation.en: So that's it. That's why he won't change me?
translation.ja: 彼が私を変身させないのは 私の魂を守るため？

translation.en: Imagine the situation in reverse, hmm?
translation.ja: もし逆の立場だったら？

translation.en: If you believed as Edward does,
translation.ja: 彼が地獄へ堕ちるとしたら⸺

translation.en: could you take away his soul?

translation.ja: 私を すべてから守るなんて

translation.en: At some point, something's gonna separate us.
It's gonna be an accident or illness,
translation.ja: 私は事故にも遭うし 病気にもなる

translation.en: And the only solution is to change me.
translation.ja: だから吸血鬼に変えて

translation.en: That's not a solution, that's a tragedy.
translation.ja: それは解決じゃない 悲劇だ

translation.en: You're not gonna want me when I look like a grandmother.
translation.ja: 老婆になっても愛せる？

translation.en: Bella, do you not understand my feelings for you at all?
translation.ja: ベラ 僕の気持ちを 分かってないね

translation.en: How you feel about your soul.
So can I ask one thing?
Come and take a walk with me.
Carlisle is supposed to be ten years older than he looks,
translation.ja: カーライルは 若く見えすぎると⸺

translation.en: and people are starting to notice.
I've got to think of something to say to Charlie.
translation.ja: パパへの口実を考える

translation.en: I mean my family and myself.
Edward, what happened with Jasper… It's nothing.
translation.ja: ジャスパーのこと あれは何でもないわ
そうだ 何でもない

translation.en: Nothing but what I always expected.
And nothing compared to what could have happened.
You just don't belong in my world, Bella.
translation.ja: 君は 違う世界のものだ
違う　そうじゃない

translation.en: I don't want you to come.
translation.ja: 君には来てほしくない

translation.en: But if it's not too much to ask,
can you just promise me something?
And I'll promise something to you in return.
This is the last time you'll ever see me.
translation.ja: 僕を見るのは これが最後だ

translation.en: And you can go on with your life without any interference from me.
translation.ja: 君は僕に邪魔されずに 人生を送れる
存在しなかったように

translation.en: If this is about my soul, take it. I don't want it without you.
translation.ja: 魂なら奪って 別れるなら魂なんか要らない

translation.en: You're just not good for me.
translation.ja: 君は僕に ふさわしくないんだ

translation.en: Not good enough for you. [breathes shakily]
I'm just sorry I let this go on for so long.
translation.ja: もっと早く 別れるべきだった

translation.en: I'm going to try the Cullens' place again.
translation.ja: もう一度 カレンを

translation.en: ♪ There's a possibility ♪ ♪ All that I had ♪
Who else can I talk to? I'm lost.
translation.ja: “でも話し相手は あなただけ”

translation.en: But the absence of him is everywhere I look.
It's like a huge hole has been punched through my chest.
translation.ja: “私の心には　　　　　 大きな穴が開いたまま”

translation.en: [Bella] But in a way, I'm glad.
The pain is my only reminder that he was real. That you all were.
translation.ja: “この痛みは彼や あなたたちが 存在した証拠”

translation.en: You're going to Jacksonville. Live with your mother.
translation.ja: フロリダのママの所へ行け

translation.en: It's just not normal, this behavior.
translation.ja: お前の様子は尋常じゃない

translation.en: [Charlie] Quite frankly, it's scaring the hell out of me and your mother.
translation.ja: 正直 言って怖いんだ パパもママも

translation.en: Baby, I… I don't want you to leave.
translation.ja: 本当は お前を 手放したくはないが⸺

translation.en: I don't, but just go. Go to Jacksonville.
translation.ja: 本当は お前を 手放したくはないが⸺ 環境を変えて 新しい友達を作れ

translation.en: -Make some new friends. -I like my old friends.
translation.ja: 環境を変えて 新しい友達を作れ ここにも友達が

translation.en: …gonna, uh, go shopping tomorrow with Jessica.
translation.ja: ジェシカと買い物に行くの
女の子同士の付き合いよ
いいぞ　行ってこい

translation.en: [Jessica] I don't know why you want to sit through all those zombies eating people and no hot guys kissing anybody.
translation.ja: なんでゾンビ映画 観るわけ？ イケメンも出てこないし⸺

translation.en: Why are there that many zombie movies anyway? If it's supposed to, like, draw a parallel about leprosy,
translation.ja: 病気の たとえ話だとしても シャレになんない

translation.en: my cousin had leprosy. It's not funny, you know.
translation.ja: 私の いとこも病気だから

translation.en: And, like, is it supposed to be a metaphor for consumerism,
translation.ja: もし消費社会への警告でも⸺

translation.en: 'cause don't be so pleased with your own, like, self-reverential cleverness, you know.
translation.ja: 自分が買い物嫌いだからって 喜ばないでよね

translation.en: Like, some girls like to shop. Not all girls, apparently.
translation.ja: 普通の女の子は 買い物が大好き

translation.en: Though I was surprised you even called at all, you know?
translation.ja: でも電話くれて驚いたわ

translation.en: Like, your depression thing, I get it. I'm totally, totally worried.
translation.ja: あんたのこと めちゃめちゃ心配してた

translation.en: But after a while, it's like, -you're still bumming? -[man] Want a ride, girls? And I'm going through stuff too.
translation.ja: ていうか 私も落ち込んでるのよね
マイクが“友達でいよう”って…

translation.en: I think I know those guys.
Well, they seem great. Can we go?
translation.ja: い(・い｜・)連中みたい　行こう

translation.en: All right, all right, we got a taker.
-Turn around. -♪ All my life I've been searching♪
I'm sorry, I thought you were somebody else.
No, that's cool. I'll be whoever you want me to be, honey.

translation.ja: ムチャはしない約束だ

translation.en: You promised it would be as if you never existed.
translation.ja: 二度と姿を見せない約束よ

translation.en: Did you say something, babe? You know what, never mind.
translation.ja: 何か言ったか？ まあ いいや

translation.en: [Jessica] Hey, um, what the hell's wrong with you?
translation.ja: ベラ　一体どうしたのよ？

translation.en: I thought that I saw something.

translation.ja: どうかしてる 自殺願望でもあるみたい

translation.en: That homeboy could have been a psycho.
translation.ja: あいつが殺人鬼だったら⸺

translation.en: I was about to end up in an FBI interview room like some lame TV show.
translation.ja: 私 ドラマみたいに 事情聴取 受けてたかも

translation.en: God, that was such a rush.
Awesome, so you're an adrenaline junkie now?
translation.ja: もしアドレナリン中毒なら⸺

translation.en: That's cool, you can go bungee jumping.
translation.ja: もしアドレナリン中毒なら⸺ チンピラと遊ぶより バンジージャンプでもして

translation.en: You don't get on the back of some random loser's motorcycle.
translation.ja: チンピラと遊ぶより バンジージャンプでもして

translation.en: Maybe I'm crazy now. I guess that's okay.
translation.ja: “私 どうかしてる でもいい”

translation.en: If a rush of danger is what it takes to see him, then that's what I'll find.
translation.ja: “危険なマネをして会えるなら いくらでもする”

translation.en: Where the hell have you been, loca?
translation.ja: 久しぶりだね　元気？
ちょっと見せたい物が
クズ鉄か　ありがとう

translation.en: -You shouldn't have. -I saved it from the junkyard.
translation.ja: クズ鉄か　ありがとう 廃品置き場のよ

translation.en: I think they'll probably cost more to fix than they're worth.
translation.ja: まともに修理したら高い

translation.en: But then I thought that if I had a mechanic friend - to help me out, then… - Ah, me.
translation.ja: でもメカに強い友達に 頼めば…
そのメ(・カ｜・男｜・)が僕ってこと？

translation.en: Since when are you into motorcycles?
I get it if you think that this is really stupid and reckless.
translation.ja: バカでムチャなマネだと 思ってるんでしょ？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean it's completely stupid and reckless.
translation.ja: かなりバカでムチャだ

translation.en: Oh, wait, be careful. Those things are actually really heavy, so…
translation.ja: 待って　気をつけて すごく重たいから…

translation.en: Jake, you're, like, buff. How did that happen?
translation.ja: ジェイコブ　すごい筋肉ね まだ16歳なのに どうして？

translation.en: You're, like, 16. I don't get it.
translation.ja: まだ16歳なのに どうして？

translation.en: [chuckles] Age is just a number, baby. What are you, like, 40 now?
translation.ja: 年は関係ない　君は40歳？

translation.en: -♪ I may never ever find a cure ♪ -Feels like that sometimes.
That song's good. You don't like it?

translation.ja: そう　音楽は なしか

translation.en: So, I was thinking, if we're going to do this every day, and hopefully we will,
translation.ja: 毎日 こうして 修理するとしたら⸺

translation.en: we have to, like, fit some homework in there somewhere.
translation.ja: 宿題も やらなきゃね

translation.en: I don't want Billy thinking that I'm a bad influence on you.
translation.ja: 私がビリーに怒られる
僕に悪影響だからと？ よせよ

translation.en: Are you… I'm older than you, so…
translation.ja: 私は年上よ 影響を与えるのは⸺

translation.en: …that makes me the influencer, and you the influencee.
translation.ja: 私の方　あなたは受ける方

translation.en: [laughing] No, no, no. My size and knowledge base actually makes me older than you,
translation.ja: まさか　体格や知識から言って 僕の方が年上さ

translation.en: because of your general paleness and lack of know-how.
translation.ja: 君は白人の お嬢様だ

translation.en: I convinced you to build two-wheeled death machines with me. Don't you think that makes you kind of young and naive?
translation.ja: 女の頼みで“死のマシン”を 作る男が大人？

translation.en: Okay, so where do we stand?
I'm 35. -And you might be, like, 32. -[knock at door]
translation.ja: 私が35で あなたは32ってとこね

translation.en: No, it's ok, it's just my boys.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ダチだから

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah. I taught him everything he knows.
translation.ja: 私 メカに詳(・し｜・く｜・て｜・)

translation.en: What about the part where you're his girlfriend?
translation.ja: ガールフレンドだって？

translation.en: Actually, remember I said she's a girl and a friend.
translation.ja: 違うよ　“女の友達(ガール＆フレンド)”って 言ったんだ

translation.en: Embry, do you remember him making that distinction?
So you guys have girlfriends. That's awesome.
Yeah, right. Quil's actually taking his cousin to prom.
translation.ja: クイルは いとこと プロムへ行くのさ

translation.en: You want funny, Black? I'll give you funny.
[Embry] I got five bucks on Quil.
[Bella] Dear Alice, I wish I had your real address.
translation.ja: “アリス　　　　　　　　 使えるメアドがあれば⸺”

translation.en: I wish I could tell you about Jake.
I mean, he makes me feel alive.
translation.ja: “一緒にいると明るくなれる”

translation.en: Well, when I'm with Jake, it's…
…it's like it's almost healed. For a while.
translation.ja: “癒やされる気がする つかの間でも…”

translation.en: [Jacob] So, Quil keeps asking to come over. I think he likes you a little too much.
translation.ja: クイルが来たいってさ 君を好きみたいだ

translation.en: Well, I'm really not into the whole cougar thing, you know?
translation.ja: 私は年下好みじゃないの

translation.en: What's up with you and age?
I mean, how old was that Cullen guy anyway?
translation.ja: カレン家の彼は何歳だった？

translation.en: [Bella] But even Jake can't keep the dreams away.
Well, I thought this thing was starting to work, but…
translation.ja: その先住民の お守りも⸺

translation.en: That seems to take your mind off things a bit, doesn't it?
translation.ja: いい癒やしに なってるんじゃないか？

translation.en: …you gotta learn to love what's good for you.
translation.ja: 自分のために人を愛せ

translation.en: Of course, what do I know?
If I told you I couldn't have fixed these bikes, what would you have said?
translation.ja: もしバイクは直せなかったと 言ったら どうする？

translation.en: Are you doubting your mad skills?
translation.ja: メカに自信がないわけ？

translation.en: No. Definitely not. I mean, they'll run fine.
translation.ja: 違うよ　バイクは ちゃんと走るさ

translation.en: Maybe if I was smart, I would have dragged out the rebuild a bit.
translation.ja: わざと時間をかければ よかった

translation.en: If you told me you couldn't fix these bikes,
translation.ja: もし修理できなかった としたら⸺

translation.en: I would say that that's really too bad,
translation.ja: もし修理できなかった としたら⸺ それは残念だけど⸺

translation.en: but that we're just gonna have to find something else to do.
translation.ja: それは残念だけど⸺ また２人の楽しみを探すわ

translation.en: They're not really fighting, Bella. They're cliff diving.
translation.ja: ケンカじゃないよ クリフダイビングだ

translation.en: Scary as hell, but a total rush.
translation.ja: 怖いけど めちゃ興奮する

translation.en: [Jacob] Most of us jump from lower down. We leave the showing off to Sam and his disciples.
translation.ja: 僕らは低い所から飛ぶ 奴らは目立ちたがり屋さ

translation.en: You have some kind of beef with him or something?
[Jacob] They just think they run this place.
translation.ja: でも居留地を仕切ってる

translation.en: Embry used to call them hall monitors on steroids.
translation.ja: 偉そうにタフガイ気取りで
見ろよ エンブリー？

translation.en: He missed some school. Now, all of a sudden, he started following Sam around like a little puppy.
translation.ja: 学校に来なくなって サムに くっついて回ってる

translation.en: Same thing happened with Paul and Jared.
translation.ja: ポールとジャレッドもだ

translation.en: Sam keeps giving me this look.
Like he's waiting for me or something.
It's kind of starting to freak me out.
Well, you should just avoid him.

translation.ja: よし　ブレーキは？ これ
よし　ゆっくり クラッチを放すんだ

translation.en: -I want to go again. -Are you trying to get yourself killed?
translation.ja: もう一度 死ぬ気か？

translation.en: -I want to go again. -No, forget it.
Well, it's just blood, Bella. No big deal.
translation.ja: ただの血だ どうってことない

translation.en: How hard did you hit your head?
[Angela] I did see something in the woods.

translation.ja: 信じるよ　アンジェラ

translation.en: No, he doesn't. He's just trying to get lucky.
translation.ja: ウソ　口(くち)がうまい

translation.en: [Angela] No. It was jet black and huge.
translation.ja: とにかく真っ黒で 巨大な生き物だったわ

translation.en: On all fours, it was still taller than a person.
Or an alien. You're lucky you didn't get probed.
[Bella] You know you're not the only one.
Um, my dad's been getting reports at the station.
Like, five hikers have been killed by some bear, but they can't find the bear.
translation.ja: 犠牲者は５人だけど クマは見つかってないの

translation.en: Last time you clowns doubt my girlfriend.
Um, so listen, you know, now that, you know, you're talking and, uh…
translation.ja: また普通に話が できるようになって⸺

translation.en: eating again, which, you know, gotta get that protein in there.
translation.ja: 食欲も戻ったなら⸺ 栄養も摂(と)らなきゃね

translation.en: I was just wondering if you wanted to go see a movie with me.
translation.ja: どうかな　僕と一緒に 映画でも行かない？

translation.en: Cool, um… Let me see, we could check out, um…
translation.ja: よかった 何を観にいこうか

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Love Spelled Backwards Is Love.
You know, it's a dumb title, but, um, it's a romantic comedy.
translation.ja: バカなタイトルだけど ラブコメで…

translation.en: -I mean, it's supposed to be… -No. No romance.
translation.ja: バカなタイトルだけど ラブコメで… 恋愛物はイヤ

translation.en: How about Face Punch? Have you heard of that?
[stammers] I mean, that's an action movie.
translation.ja: 過激なアクション物だろ？

translation.en: We should get a bunch of people to go. Do you guys want to go see…
translation.ja: マイク　皆で行かない？ “フェイス･パンチ”
マイク　皆で行かない？ “フェイス･パンチ” いいね

translation.en: Mike, hey. We were supposed to watch that. Remember, the trailer's like… [imitates explosion]
translation.ja: 行こうぜ　予告編 観たろ？
楽しそう　“ベラの映画会”
アクション 好きか？
退屈らしいぞ 駄作だ

translation.en: You know, are you even old enough to see this movie?
translation.ja: 年齢的に君は観ていいの？

translation.en: I mean, you know, without, like, adult supervision?
Right, yeah. Well, she's buying my ticket for me.
translation.ja: 大人の同伴なしでも？ ベラがチケット 買ってる

translation.en: Jessica bailed, and Angela got the stomach flu, so Eric's taking care of her.
translation.ja: ジェシカはパス　アンジェラは 高熱でエリックが看病

translation.en: -[gun cocks in movie] -[man 1] Put your gun down.
[man 2] Put her gun down, or I'm gonna blow your frickin' head off.
translation.ja: お前こそ捨てろ　 頭を吹っ飛ばすぞ

translation.en: [man 3] Both of you put both of your guns down,
translation.ja: お前こそ捨てろ　 頭を吹っ飛ばすぞ ２人とも銃を捨てろ　　 脳ミソ 吹っ飛ばしてやる

translation.en: or I'm gonna blow both of your frickin' heads off.
translation.ja: ２人とも銃を捨てろ　　 脳ミソ 吹っ飛ばしてやる

translation.en: [man 1] All right, forget it. Let's do this!
Okay, I… I think I'm gonna throw up. [groans]
You should hold out for someone with a stronger stomach.
translation.ja: もっと胃袋の 頑丈な奴にしなよ

translation.en: Someone who laughs at the gore that makes weaker men vomit.
translation.ja: 血がドバドバ 出るシーンでも 笑ってる奴

translation.en: Yeah, I'll keep my eye open for that.
translation.ja: そうね　探しとくわ

translation.en: I feel bad, he probably has that flu that's… going around.
translation.ja: マイクも流行(はや)りの⸺ インフルエンザかも

translation.en: What, I can't hold your hand?
I just think it, you know, means something a little different to you, so…
translation.ja: でも あなたにとっては 違う意味でしょ？

translation.en: Okay, well, tell me something. You like me, right?
translation.ja: じゃ 聞くけど 僕のこと 好きだろ？

translation.en: And you think I'm sort of beautiful.

translation.ja: ジェイコブ やめて
あなたが⸺ 必要なの

translation.en: Well, I've got loads of time.
It's just 'cause I don't want you to go anywhere.
You know, I'm not like a car that you can fix up.
translation.ja: 私は修理のできない車よ

translation.en: I'm never gonna run right, so I should be fair to you.
translation.ja: 二度と走れない だから期待しないで

translation.en: I know what he did to you.
translation.ja: 彼は ひどい仕打ちをした

translation.en: And Bella, I would never, ever do that.
translation.ja: でも⸺ 僕は絶対に君を捨てない

translation.en: I won't ever hurt you. I promise.
translation.ja: 君を傷つけたりしないよ

translation.en: I'm… I was feeling sick before the movie, okay?
translation.ja: 映画の前から 気分が悪かったんだ

translation.en: Feeling sick? Maybe you need to go to the hospital.
translation.ja: 気分が悪けりゃ病院へ行け

translation.en: You want me to put you in the hospital?
Jake. Jake, Jake, the movie's over. What are you doing?
translation.ja: 待って　映画じゃないのよ
あなた⸺ 体が熱いわ

translation.en: Like, you feel like you have a fever. Are you okay?
[Bella on phone] Jake, your dad says you have mono?
translation.ja: ジェイコブ　　　　 感染症だと聞いたわ

translation.en: He won't let me visit, but would you call me?
translation.ja: 会いには行けないけど 電話して

translation.en: Hey. It's me again, I just…
translation.ja: また私だけど… ごめんね

translation.en: I'm sorry about what I said at the movie theater.
I just wanted to hear your voice, so no pressure.
translation.ja: 声が聞きたかったの またね
ジェイコブ　お願い

translation.en: [Charlie] Okay. We should be back around three.
Look, I don't have to go fishing today.
Yeah, you do. Go. What are you talking about?
translation.ja: そうよ　いいから行って

translation.en: Those bears won't get the drop on me, Bella. My kung fu is strong.
translation.ja: クマなら心配ない おれがカンフーで倒すさ

translation.en: I thought you were too sick to come outside.
translation.ja: 具合が悪いと思ってた

translation.en: Or pick up the phone when I call.
translation.ja: 電話にも出られないくらい

translation.en: What happened to you? What's wrong? Hey!
Did Sam get to you? Is that what's happening?
No, Sam's trying to help me. Don't blame him.
translation.ja: サムは僕の味方だ 彼を責めるな

translation.en: But if you want somebody to blame, how about those filthy bloodsuckers you love?
translation.ja: 誰かを責めたきゃ あの吸血野郎たちを責めろ

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -You know exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.ja: 何のこと？ 分かってるはずだ

translation.en: You've been lying to everyone. Charlie.
translation.ja: 君は皆を だました チャーリーも

translation.en: But you can't lie to me.
translation.ja: でも僕は だませない

translation.en: [stammering] Jake, I know that I've been…
It's… it's killing me. It kills me.
translation.ja: そのことが たまらなく苦しいの

translation.en: I just need… maybe, give me, like, some time or something--
translation.ja: だけど もし時間をくれたら…

translation.en: It's not you, it's me, right? Really?
translation.ja: “僕のせい”？ そんなの気休めよ
違う　本当に僕が悪いんだ
僕は いい人間じゃない

translation.en: I used to be. A good kid.
translation.ja: 以前は⸺ いい奴だった

translation.en: This doesn't even matter, all right?
translation.ja: それに話してもムダだ 終わりなんだ

translation.en: -This is over. -You can't break up with me.
translation.ja: それに話してもムダだ 終わりなんだ イヤよ

translation.en: I mean, you're my best friend.
I promised I wouldn't hurt you, Bella.
And this is me keeping that promise.
And don't come back. Or you're gonna get hurt.
translation.ja: もう二度と来るな ここは危険だ

translation.en: Without Jake, I just… I can't stand it.
translation.ja: “ジェイコブなしでは 耐えられない”

translation.en: But I really feel like he never existed.
I will find the place where I can see him again.
I didn't expect to find you here.
I went to visit Cullens, but…
translation.ja: カレンの所を訪ねたら⸺

translation.en: I'm surprised they left you behind.
translation.ja: 君を置いていくとはね
彼らは よく会いにくるのか？

translation.en: I'll tell them that you stopped by.
translation.ja: あなたのこと 伝えるわ
言わない　エドワードには

translation.en: But he's far away, isn't he?
translation.ja: でも遠くへ行ったんだろ？

translation.en: She asked me to see if you were still under the protection of the Cullens.
translation.ja: まだカレンが君を 保護してるか見てこいと

translation.en: Victoria feels it's only fair to kill Edward's mate,
translation.ja: エドワードの恋人を 殺すとさ

translation.en: given he killed hers. An eye for an eye.
translation.ja: 奴に彼女の恋人を 殺された復讐だ

translation.en: Edward would know who did it. And he'd come after you.
translation.ja: 彼にバレて あなた 追われるわ

translation.en: After all, how much could you mean to him
if he left you here unprotected?
Oh, Victoria won't be happy about my killing you.
translation.ja: 彼女は自分で殺す気さ

translation.en: But I can't help myself. You are so mouthwatering.
translation.ja: だが たまらん 君の血が欲しい

translation.en: Please don't. I mean, you helped us.
translation.ja: やめて 以前は助けてくれた
落ちつけ　怖がるな

translation.en: Don't be afraid. I'm doing you a kindness.
translation.ja: 落ちつけ　怖がるな これは親切心だ

translation.en: [whispers] Victoria plans on killing you slowly.
translation.ja: 彼女は なぶり殺しにする
だが おれは一瞬だ

translation.en: I promise. You will feel nothing.
translation.ja: 約束する 痛みも何も感じない
エドワード　愛してる

translation.en: -In the woods. They're not bears. -What do you mean, in the woods?
translation.ja: 森でよ　クマじゃないわ 何しに森へなんか行った？

translation.en: Bell, what the hell were you doing out in the woods?
translation.ja: 何しに森へなんか行った？

translation.en: They're wolves. I mean, they're, like, huge wolves.
translation.ja: オオカミよ ものすごく大きなオオカミ

translation.en: Are you sure about that, Bella?
Yeah, I just saw them. They were after… something.
translation.ja: 確かに見たわ 何かを⸺ 追ってた
分かった　それじゃ ハリー

translation.en: Feel like going hunting? Get some of your guys together?
translation.ja: 狩りにいくか 仲間を集めて

translation.en: Sure, yeah, I'll, I'll just, uh…
translation.ja: そうだな ちょっと失礼

translation.en: [Bella] By now, those wolves will be dead.
And Laurent would have told her I'm unprotected.
I should go to the station.
Dad, you should… you should go.
[Charlie] Can you just stay in the house?
Oh, you scared me. What the hell are you doing?
translation.ja: 脅かさないで 何なの？
下がって　行くから
何が？ 説明したいけどムリだ
説明したいけどムリだ 絶対に

translation.en: Have you ever had a secret you couldn't tell anyone?
translation.ja: 誰にも言えない秘密を 持ったことは？

translation.en: One that wasn't yours to share?
Well, that's what it's like for me.
You have no idea how tight I'm bound.
translation.ja: とてもキビしい束縛を 受けてる

translation.en: I hate what they've done to you.
I mean, the killer part is you already know.
translation.ja: でも君は もう知ってる

translation.en: Bella, do you remember when we walked on the beach at La Push?
translation.ja: ベラ ラプッシュの海岸で 話したこと⸺
覚えてるわ　あの伝説

translation.en: I guess I understand why that's the only part you remember.
translation.ja: その部分しか 覚えてないんだね

translation.en: -that you can do. -No. I'm in it for life.
translation.ja: ないの？ ああ　一生 逃げられない

translation.en: Maybe we should just get out of here for awhile.
translation.ja: しばらく町を 出るっていうのは？

translation.en: We'll just leave. Just you and me.
translation.ja: しばらく町を 出るっていうのは？ 私も行くわ

translation.en: I would do it for you.
It's not something I can just run away from, Bella.
translation.ja: でも逃げられないんだ

translation.en: But I would run away with you.
translation.ja: できるなら⸺ 君と逃げるけど

translation.en: I gotta go. They'll start wondering where I am.
translation.ja: もう行かなきゃ 仲間が捜す
あの話を⸺ 思い出して

translation.en: It'd be so much easier if you knew.
translation.ja: 君が知ってくれたら⸺ 楽になれる
努力するわ　でもジェイコブ

translation.en: Jake, what are you doing? Wait, Jake.
translation.ja: 何してるの　待って
エドワード　怖いわ

translation.en: [Jacob] Really, it's just, like, an old story.
translation.ja: ただの伝説だ　怪談話さ

translation.en: I'm not really supposed to say anything about it.
Did you know Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
translation.ja: 僕ら キラユーテ族は オオカミの子孫

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, I really need to see him.
-What did you do? -[man] Hey! -What did you do to him? -Easy.
-He didn't want this. -What did we do?
translation.ja: ひどすぎる あいつは何をしゃべった？

translation.en: What did he do, hmm? What'd he tell you?
translation.ja: あいつは何をしゃべった？

translation.en: -Both of you, calm down. -Nothing. He tells me nothing because he's scared of you.
translation.ja: 何もよ 怖がって言えなかった
ポール　冷静になるんだ

translation.en: Hey. Take Bella back to Emily's place.
translation.ja: ベラをエミリーの家へ

translation.en: Guess the wolf's out of the bag.
is it possible that everything is true?
translation.ja: “すべて現実って あり得る？”

translation.en: The fairy tales and horror stories.
Is it possible that there isn't anything sane and normal at all?
translation.ja: “正気の沙汰も何もない こんな世界なんて”

translation.en: Hey, I think we should go back and see if Jacob's okay.
I hope Paul sinks some teeth in him. Serves him right.
translation.ja: ポールが咬(か)み殺したかも

translation.en: No way, Jacob's a natural. You see him phase on the fly? [Jared] I got five says Paul doesn't touch him.
translation.ja: まさか　ジェイコブは やたら強いオオカミだぜ

translation.en: Come on in, Bella. We won't bite.
translation.ja: 来いよ　咬みやしないさ

translation.en: Oh, hey, about Emily, Sam's fiancée. Don't stare. It bugs Sam.
translation.ja: エミリーはサムの婚約者だが 見つめるな　サムが怒る

translation.en: [Emily] You guys hungry? Like I have to ask.
translation.ja: お腹すいた？ なんて当然よね

translation.en: Hmm, so… You're the vampire girl.
translation.ja: あなたが吸血鬼の彼女ね？
あなたはオオカミの彼女？

translation.en: Guess so. Well, I'm engaged to one.
translation.ja: まあね というより婚約者よ
仲間にも残してね レディ･ファーストよ
仲間にも残してね レディ･ファーストよ マフィンは？

translation.en: Leave it to Jacob to find a way around Sam's gag order.
translation.ja: ジェイコブは 口外禁止令に背いた

translation.en: Um, he didn't say anything to me.
translation.ja: 彼は何も言ってないわ

translation.en: That's a wolf thing. Alpha's orders get obeyed whether we want 'em to or not.
translation.ja: オオカミ人間は リーダーの命令に絶対服従

translation.en: Oh, and check it out. We can hear each other's thoughts.
translation.ja: テレパシーも交わせる

translation.en: Would you shut up? These are trade secrets.
translation.ja: バカだな　それは おれたちの企(・業｜・秘｜・密｜・)だろ？

translation.en: Damn it! This chick runs with vampires.
translation.ja: バカだな　それは おれたちの企(・業｜・秘｜・密｜・)だろ？ 吸血鬼とツルんでる

translation.en: You can't really run with vampires.

translation.ja: おれたちの方が速いぜ

translation.en: You're not the first monsters I've met.
translation.ja: 怪物は初めてじゃないの

translation.en: Jake's right. You're good with weird.
translation.ja: なるほど 慣れてるな
ああ　僕が知る限りね

translation.en: A few lucky members of the tribe have the gene.
translation.ja: 部族の数人に遺伝子が

translation.en: If a bloodsucker moves into town,
Well, can't you find a way to just…

translation.ja: だって道徳に反するわ

translation.en: It's not a lifestyle choice, Bella.
translation.ja: 自分じゃ選べないんだ

translation.en: I was born this way, I can't help it.
You're such a hypocrite. What, I'm not the right kind of monster for you?
translation.ja: 偽善者だな 吸血鬼は許せるくせに

translation.en: It's what you do. They never hurt anybody.
translation.ja: 問題は行動よ カレン家は殺さないけど⸺
あなたたちは… ベラ　僕らは 誰も殺してない
ベラ　僕らは 誰も殺してない

translation.en: What we're trying to protect you people from.
translation.ja: 僕らは人間を守ってる

translation.en: The only thing we do kill.
translation.ja: 唯一 僕らが殺す敵は⸺

translation.en: Don't worry, we can't touch your little precious Cullens unless they violate the treaty.
translation.ja: カレン家には手を出さない 彼らが協定を守る限り

translation.en: I… It's not what I'm saying. [stutters]
Really? We took out that leech with the dreads easy enough.
translation.ja: あのラスタ･ヘアの ヒル野郎を殺したよ

translation.en: And his red-headed girlfriend is next.
Was. We chased her all the way to the Canadian border the other night.
translation.ja: 何度 カナダ国境へ 追い払っても⸺

translation.en: She keeps coming back. We don't know what she's after.
translation.ja: 戻ってくる 何を狙ってるのか

translation.en: Don't worry. We've got this place covered.
translation.ja: 心配ない 僕らが見張ってる

translation.en: She won't get near you or Charlie.
She's fast. You don't know how fast she is.
translation.ja: 彼女は ものすごく 足が速いの

translation.en: You know, your lack of confidence in us is a little insulting.
translation.ja: 僕らを信じてないね 侮辱だな

translation.en: And lately, that's all the time.

translation.ja: “彼はヴィクトリアを狩りに”

translation.en: [Bella] But I realize where I have to go. What I have to do to see him again.
translation.ja: “でも あそこへ行けば 彼に会える”

translation.en: You wanted me to be human.
You won't stay with me any other way.

translation.ja: お願いだ　息をして

translation.en: Bella. Bella, can you hear me?
[Jacob] What the hell were you thinking?
I just wanted to see something.
Get her home! I'm gonna go help out over at Harry's place.
translation.ja: 彼女を家へ おれはハリーの所へ行く

translation.en: Harry Clearwater had a heart attack.
Charlie and my dad are over at his place with his family.
translation.ja: チャーリーたちも行ってる

translation.en: Come on. I'll get you something dry and drive you home.
translation.ja: 行こう　家まで送る

translation.en: Hundred and eight degrees over here.
It must be nice never getting cold.
It's not. It's a Jacob thing.
translation.ja: 違うわ ジェイコブだから⸺

translation.en: [Jacob] Is this better? Now that you know about me.
translation.ja: 君が僕の正体を知ったのは よかったけど…

translation.en: You saw what happened to Emily.
translation.ja: エミリーの顔 見たろ？

translation.en: Lost it for a split second…
He'll never be able to take that back.
What if I got mad at you?
I feel like I'm gonna disappear.
translation.ja: 人間性を失いそうになる

translation.en: Okay, not that you need me to tell you something like this.
translation.ja: こんなこと⸺ 言うまでもないけど⸺

translation.en: But I always will. You're not gonna lose yourself.
translation.ja: あなたは人間性を 失ったりしないわ

translation.en: I'll tell you all the time…

translation.ja: ありがとう　助けてくれて

translation.en: I can smell it. I'm getting you out of here.
translation.ja: ニオイがする　僕に任せて

translation.en: Look, if a Cullen is back here, this is their territory.
translation.ja: もしカレンなら ここは彼らの領域だ

translation.en: Treaty says we can only defend on our own lands.
translation.ja: 協定で僕は入れない 君を守れないよ

translation.en: -I can't protect you here. -Okay, it's okay.
translation.ja: 協定で僕は入れない 君を守れないよ 守る必要ないわ

translation.en: You're about to cross a line.

translation.ja: 止めないで お願い

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Alice] Bella. What are you… [gasps]
I'm sorry, I just-- I can't believe you're here. Is… [stutters]
translation.ja: ごめんなさい　あんまり うれしくて つい…

translation.en: Would you like to explain to me how you're alive?
translation.ja: どうやって命拾いしたの？

translation.en: I saw a vision of you. You jumped off a cliff.
translation.ja: あなたを見(・た｜・)の 崖から飛び降りたでしょ？

translation.en: Why in the hell would you try and kill yourself?
translation.ja: なぜ自殺なんか？ チャーリーは どうなるの？

translation.en: -I mean, what about Charlie? What about-- -I didn't try to kill myself.
translation.ja: なぜ自殺なんか？ チャーリーは どうなるの？ 自殺じゃないわ
クリフダイビングって スポーツ

translation.en: I have never met anyone more prone to life-threatening idiocy.
translation.ja: あなたほど命知らずの バカもいないわ

translation.en: Did you… did you tell him?
translation.ja: エドワードには言った？

translation.en: He only calls in once every few months.
translation.ja: 彼は数ヶ月に１度 連絡してくるだけ

translation.en: He said he wants to be alone.
Bella, what is that god-awful wet dog smell?
translation.ja: この濡れた犬のような ニオイは何？
それか⸺ ジェイコブよ

translation.en: Bella! Werewolves are not good company to keep.
translation.ja: ベラ　そんな人と 付き合っちゃダメよ

translation.en: I had to see you were safe.
I thought you couldn't protect me here.
[Alice] Well, I'm not going to hurt her.
No, you're just a harmless Cullen.
I'm talking about the other bloodsucker who tried to kill Bella because of you.
translation.ja: 復讐でベラの命を 狙ってるのがいる
ヴィクトリア？ 出没してるの

translation.en: I didn't see you get pulled out of the water either.
translation.ja: ベラが水中から助かるのも

translation.en: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts.
translation.ja: 犬(・も｜・ど｜・き｜・)が からむと見えない

translation.en: -Or things are gonna get very ugly. -Stop, stop. Stop, stop.
You're not going anywhere, you're gonna come back, right?
translation.ja: また戻ってくるでしょ？

translation.en: As soon as you put the dog out.
Are there others? How many Cullens are here, and how long are they staying?
translation.ja: カレンの ほかの奴も 来てるのか？

translation.en: And she can stay as long as she'd like.
Well, if that's all, then you'd better go run back to Sam.
translation.ja: じゃ サムの所へ戻って
約束を破ってばかりだ

translation.en: We don't have to do this to each other.
translation.ja: 私たち 傷つけ合ってる

translation.en: -Jake, who was that? -Bella. Bella, it's Edward. He thinks you're dead.
translation.ja: エドワードからよ あなたが死んだと思って

translation.en: [Alice] Rosalie told him why I came here.
translation.ja: ロザリーが彼に伝えたの

translation.en: Why would you… Why didn't you let me speak to him?
translation.ja: なぜ私に代わらなかったの？

translation.en: -He didn't ask for you. -I don't care!
translation.ja: 奴のせいだ 関係ないわ！

translation.en: Bella, he's going to the Volturi.
[Jacob] He left you, Bella. He didn't want you anymore, remember?
translation.ja: 奴は君を捨てたんだぞ

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna let him kill himself out of guilt.
translation.ja: ダメよ 罪悪感から死ぬなんて

translation.en: I'm 18. I'm legally free to go and I left a note.
translation.ja: 私は18よ パパには置き手紙を
行くな　ここに残れ

translation.en: So you've made up your minds.

translation.ja: 君が死んで特殊な能力が⸺

translation.en: [clicks tongue] But if you're unhappy with your lot,
translation.ja: もし今の君が それほど不幸なら⸺

translation.en: We would be delighted to utilize your skills.
translation.ja: 我々は君の能力を 喜んで活用しよう

translation.en: Won't you consider staying with us?
translation.ja: どうだ　考えてみないか

translation.en: You know it will happen anyway.

translation.ja: 理由がなければ行わん

translation.en: I'm guessing you didn't rent this car?
I figured you wouldn't be opposed to grand theft auto.
translation.ja: 車泥棒したの　許して

translation.en: He's gonna make a scene. Show himself to the humans.
translation.ja: 彼は人間の前で 正体をさらす

translation.en: [Alice] He's gonna wait until noon, when the sun's at its highest.
translation.ja: 太陽が真上に昇る正午よ
急いで ヴォルテッラよ

translation.en: -Why are they all in red? -San Marco's Day festival.
translation.ja: 赤い服は？ 聖マルコの日なの

translation.en: They're commemorating the expulsion of vampires from the city.
translation.ja: 町から吸血鬼を 追い払った祝日

translation.en: It's the perfect setting. The Volturi will never let him get far enough to reveal himself.
translation.ja: だから尚さら ヴォルトゥーリは 彼を阻止する

translation.en: you're the only one he can't see coming.
If I go, he'll read my thoughts. He'll think I'm lying.
translation.ja: 助けたいって心が 読まれずに

translation.en: -He'll rush into it. -Where do I go?
translation.ja: 助けたいって心が 読まれずに 場所は？

translation.en: [Alice] He'll be under the clock tower. Go!
Open your eyes, look at me.
I'm alive. You have to move. [breathes shakily]
translation.ja: 私は生きてる　下がって

translation.en: I needed to make you see me once.
translation.ja: とにかく知らせなきゃって…

translation.en: You had to know I was alive, you didn't have to feel guilty about anything.
translation.ja: 生きてるわ 罪悪感など必要ない

translation.en: I can let you go now.
translation.ja: 私は大丈夫 あなたなしでも…

translation.en: I never acted out of guilt.
I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
translation.ja: 君なしでは 生きられなかった

translation.en: [Edward] I lied. I had to lie.
translation.ja: あれはウソだ 君は僕のウソを すぐに信じた

translation.en: But you believed me so easily.
translation.ja: 君は僕のウソを すぐに信じた

translation.en: Because it doesn't make sense for you to love me.
translation.ja: あなたが私を 愛するわけないもの
私は何の価値もない ただの人間だから
君は僕の すべてだ

translation.en: I won't be needing your services after all, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 君たちは もういい

translation.en: Aro wants to speak with you again.
Nonetheless, we should take this conversation to a more appropriate venue.
translation.ja: 人目につかない場所で話そう

translation.en: Bella, why don't you go enjoy the rest of the festival.
translation.ja: ベラ　お祭りを見といで

translation.en: - The girl comes with us. - No, you can go to hell.
translation.ja: 彼女も同行を それは断る

translation.en: It's a festival. You wouldn't want to make a scene.
translation.ja: せっかくの お祭りが 台なしよ

translation.en: Aro sent me to see what was taking so long.
translation.ja: アロが待ちかねてるわ

translation.en: [Alec] Sister. Send you out to get one and you bring back two.
translation.ja: わが姉妹よ　吸血鬼を ２人も連れ帰ったか

translation.en: -Such a clever girl. -What a happy surprise!
translation.ja: 賢い子だね うれしい驚きだ！
ベラが生きていたとは
何て すばらしいんだ
ハッピーエンドは いい

translation.en: [Aro] Her blood appeals to you so much.
How can you stand to be so close to her?
translation.ja: なぜ彼女の そばに立てる？
ああ 見(・え｜・る｜・)よ

translation.en: Aro can read every thought I've ever had with one touch.
translation.ja: アロは心が読める 少し触っただけで

translation.en: You are quite a soul reader yourself, Edward.
translation.ja: 君の読心術も 大したものだね

translation.en: Though… you can't read Bella's thoughts.
translation.ja: それなのに⸺ ベラの心だけは読めない

translation.en: I would love to see if…
you are an exception to my gifts, as well.
Would you do me the honor?
Let us see if she is immune to all our powers.
translation.ja: 全員の能力に免疫があるか

translation.en: [Bella shouting] Stop! Just stop hurting him, please! Please!
translation.ja: 彼を苦しめないで お願いよ！

translation.en: This may hurt just a little.
So, what do we do with you now?
translation.ja: さて一体 君を どうしたものかな

translation.en: You already know what you're going to do, Aro.
translation.ja: どうするかは決まってる

translation.en: Kill me, kill me. Not him.
translation.ja: 殺すなら私を殺して 彼でなく

translation.en: You would give up your life…
translation.ja: 命を捧げるというのか
魂のカケラもない怪物に

translation.en: You don't know a thing… about his soul.
translation.ja: あなたは彼の魂を⸺ 分かってないわ

translation.en: If only it were your intention to give her immortality.
translation.ja: 君が彼女を 吸血鬼に変えないとはな

translation.en: Bella will be one of us.
Mesmerizing, to see what you have seen…
translation.ja: うっとりする 君の見た未来が⸺

translation.en: Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal.
translation.ja: 君は なるだろう その能力で 魅力的な⸺ 吸血鬼に

translation.en: Let us be done with this.

translation.ja: ハイディが やってくる

translation.en: I would advise that you follow through on your promise soon.
translation.ja: 約束は迅速に 実行することだな

translation.en: [Caius] We do not offer second chances.
translation.ja: 二度目のチャンスはない
さらばだ　若き友人たちよ
大漁だな ハイディ

translation.en: Yes, they do look rather juicy.
translation.ja: 汁(・気｜・)が多そうでしょ？
皆さん こちらへ 離れないで

translation.en: I'll still be here when you wake up.
[Edward] Bella. The only reason I left…
translation.ja: 僕が君から去ったのは ただ⸺

translation.en: was because I thought I was protecting you.
I needed you to have a chance
translation.ja: 君には⸺ 普通の幸せな生活を 送ってほしいと
普通の幸せな生活を 送ってほしいと

translation.en: It was so easy for you to leave.
translation.ja: 簡単に去っていったわ

translation.en: Leaving you was the hardest thing I've done in 100 years.
translation.ja: この100年で 一番 難しかったよ
二度と君を 悲しませないと

translation.en: Dad, you don't have to worry.
The last time you said that you took off. I didn't see you for three days.
translation.ja: 以前も そう言って ３日間 帰ってこなかった

translation.en: Bella… do not ever do that to me again.
translation.ja: ベラ もう家出はするな

translation.en: for the rest of your life.
We're not technically breaking any of his rules.
He did say I couldn't take a step inside the door.
I came in through the window.
He's not gonna forgive me easily.
I hope you can, 'cause I honestly don't know
translation.ja: 許してくれ 君なしでは 生きていけない
君なしでは 生きていけない
アリスが⸺ 私を変身させたら⸺

translation.en: you can't get rid of me.
She won't need to change you.
There are always ways to keep the Volturi in the dark.
translation.ja: ヴォルトゥーリには隠す

translation.en: You all know what I want.
And I know how much I'm asking for.
translation.ja: 大変な お願いなのは 分かってる

translation.en: The only thing that I can think of for it to be fair is to just vote.
translation.ja: だから公正に 多数決で決めるわ

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about.
I already consider you my sister.
translation.ja: ベラは もう私の妹よ

translation.en: It would be nice to not want to kill you all the time.
translation.ja: 君を咬む衝動から 解放される

translation.en: I'm really sorry to both of you how I've acted.
translation.ja: 今まで２人に つらく当たってた

translation.en: And I'm really grateful that you were brave enough to go and save my brother.
translation.ja: 私の弟を助けてくれて 感謝してる

translation.en: But this isn't a life I would have chosen for myself.
translation.ja: でも私は仕方なく 吸血鬼になったの

translation.en: And I wish that there had been someone to vote no for me.
translation.ja: 誰かに止めてほしかった

translation.en: And we can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way.
translation.ja: ヴォルトゥーリとは戦う

translation.en: I already consider you a part of the family.
Why are you doing this to me?
You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice.
translation.ja: 彼女なしでは死ぬ という息子だ

translation.en: [Bella] I'll wait until after graduation to make it easier on Charlie.
translation.ja: 変身は パパのために　　 卒業まで待つことにした

translation.en: Edward, I want you to be the one to do it.
translation.ja: あなたの手で変身させて

translation.en: He wants to talk to me.
[Jacob] So you're still alive for now.
[Edward] He thinks it's me keeping you away.
[Jacob] You stay the hell out of my head.
I know you have something to say to me.
But I want to say something to you first, if that's all right.
translation.ja: 僕の方を先に聞いてくれ

translation.en: Thank you for keeping Bella alive when… I didn't.
translation.ja: ベラを守ってくれて 感謝してる
違う　彼女を守ったのは⸺

translation.en: And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.
But I'm here now, and I'm not going to leave her side until she orders me away.
translation.ja: 僕は もう二度と 離れないつもりだ

translation.en: I'm here to remind you about a key point in the treaty.
translation.ja: 協定の要点を思い出せ

translation.en: If any of them bites a human, the truce is over.
translation.ja: 吸血鬼が人間を咬んだら⸺ 休戦は終わりだ

translation.en: What if I choose it? It has nothing to do with you.
No. No, I won't let you.
translation.ja: ダメだ　僕が させない

translation.en: You're not gonna be one of them, Bella.
You know what we'll do to you. I won't have a choice.

translation.ja: ベラ　行こう 待って

translation.en: Is he gonna hurt me? Read his mind.

translation.ja: 彼しか あり得ない

translation.en: No, you don't speak for her.
You can't hurt each other without hurting me.
translation.ja: 私のために戦わないで

translation.en: You shouldn't become what I am.

translation.ja: 僕に５年だけ 時間をくれ

translation.en: If you want me to do it myself.
